title: Pioneering ‘WindWings’ technology could make cargo ships greener
description: An experimental cargo ship with enormous rigid sails could lead to a major reduction in emissions by the global shipping industry.

title: Windows just gave us another reason not to download fresh updates
description: If you tend to download optional updates as soon as possible, Microsoft has just given you another reason not to do it.

title: Samsung’s forgotten HDR gaming format is finally here after two years
description: It's been a long time since the HDR10+ standard has been announced, and finally, the first game that supports it is about to come out.

title: Nvidia’s AI-driven game characters are getting toxic
description: Nvidia's latest development, Nemo SteerLM, can help game devs turn NPCs as toxic or funny as they please with AI.

title: Corsair’s new standing desk might finally tempt me to buy one
description: Corsair has just unveiled its first standing desk, the Platform:6, complete with tons of accessories and configurations.

title: Apptronik’s new humanoid robot is a rival to the Tesla Bot
description: Texas-based Apptronik has unveiled the Apollo humanoid robot. It looks a bit like the Tesla Bot and is designed for various tasks in the workplace.
